content:
MenuItemTemplateContainer Class

In this Article

Represents a container that holds the contents of a templated menu item in a Menu control.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class MenuItemTemplateContainer : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • MenuItemTemplateContainer

Remarks

The MenuItemTemplateContainer class is used by the Menu control as a container for the contents of the menu items that are rendered using a custom template.

Note

This class is used by control developers primarily when extending the Menu class to create a container for a templated menu item.

You can define a custom template for the dynamic and static menu items of a Menu control by using the DynamicItemTemplate and StaticItemTemplate properties, respectively.

For a list of initial property values for an instance of the MenuItemTemplateContainer class, see the MenuItemTemplateContainer constructor.

Gets the index value of the MenuItem object associated with the container.
IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex

Gets the index value of the menu item for the container.

Constructors

  • MenuItemTemplateContainer(Int32,MenuItem)

    Initializes a new instance of the MenuItemTemplateContainer class using the specified menu item index and menu item.

    public MenuItemTemplateContainer (int itemIndex, System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem dataItem);

    Parameters

    • itemIndex
      Int32

      The index of the menu item.

    • dataItem
      MenuItem

      The MenuItem object associated with the container.

    Remarks

    Use this constructor to create a new instance of the MenuItemTemplateContainer class using the specified menu item index and menu item.

    The following table shows initial property values for an instance of MenuItemTemplateContainer class.

    Property Initial value
    DataItem The value of the dataItem parameter.
    ItemIndex The value of the itemIndex parameter.

Properties

  • DataItem

    Gets or sets the menu item associated with the container.

    public object DataItem { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Object

      A MenuItem that represents the menu item associated with the container.

    Remarks

    Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the menu item associated with the container.

    Note

    This property is used primarily by control developers when extending the Menu class.

  • ItemIndex

    Gets the index of the menu item associated with the container.

    public int ItemIndex { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The index of the menu item associated with the container.

    Remarks

    Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index of the menu item associated with the container.

    Note

    This property is used primarily by control developers when extending the Menu class.
